text: Gu maaŋ muuŋgip, gu nde han ŋgɨp, gu ana mbui tɨvir nde neŋgɨrga. Ana mbarkɨrga buni mbatɨgira nza nzuai. Ana mba tɨvara nza mbui fhuvara. Ana vhɨra kha tɨva mbui, ana fegutari ndiav, wo phena vui fhu. Ana vhɨra gari, harigi gumgi mbe ndiav, wari wo phenin ŋgɨr za mbuim, ana mbe thɨvav, mbe vharvharav, ana vhɨra guigira Zisas khothɨgap ana zɨn vui gumgi gu mbigi, ana mbe shɨgi.
